title: Is antibiotic resistance/antiviral resistance something we should be concerned about?
body: I was talking to a friend about this a while ago, and I'm honestly kinda freaked out by these "superbugs" that get brought up. We have these bacteria and viruses that are almost impossible to treat because over the years they've become resistant to almost everything we've treated them with. Am I worrying for no reason, or will this actually be a serious issue in the future?
